title: (x) 'UPR' wide rectangular letters - various options {Rainer, Tiff}
content:
Hi, I would like to know what is the font used in the UPR letters.  
Thanks

| --- | --- |

author: dfc123

comments.content: Maybe these are just rectangles? Or go for the keyword »square« at some freefonts sites.
There must be something like this, by now, at [Fontstruct](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016090410/http:/fontstruct.fontshop.com/).
